<NEW>

Even if h=
e hadn't already been subservient to CRYOTEK and HYDRAS, DINOBOT would have=
 taken these actiosn with relish.

"GLadly."

And with that, he went to cha=
rge in over towards ANTAGONY!  The move over was a classic Metallikido char=
ge, his long blade arm up and over his head then for a powerful downward sw=
ing.

But, the swing would be a decoy, intent on drawing ANTAGONY's guard u=
pwards, where the true blow would land - in this case, a powerful forward k=
ick!

And if she was moving to dodge the kick then or would try and evade t=
o the side, then power would change over to the sweep of the clawed tail-sw=
ord to use it's superior range and buzzsaw properties to lash out at her wh=
ile she was on the defensive!

As well as with a slight backup motion now w=
here if he was engaged in grappling her at close range or she would try and=
 match him strength for strength of trying to shoot his otpic blasts into h=
er face!
